== Kottappally (CT) (627363) ==

Kottappally (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 16.08 sq. km. and harbouring 4715 households with total population of 21169 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 58 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 530 km. Male population is 9961 and female population is 11208. Scheduled Caste population is 571 and Scheduled Tribes population is 47. Census Location Code of the town is 627363<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 58 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 58 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 10 km.
